name: The ABCs of Trucks, Boats, Planes, and Trains: A Rhyming Alphabet Board Book Filled With Things That Go

title: Verified Purchase
content: Bought for my 2 grandson's. One is 2 and a half and the other is 1 year old. They both love it. This book keeps their interest. Awesome rhymes and wonderful illustrations.

title: Cute book
content: Loved the actual text and pictures, however, the board book was bent in the middle and several pages were stuck together.
